A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: We all have our opinions in how the Star Wars saga moves forward.  I was just as surprised and confused at some plot directions.  So\, I got over myself and just started to enjoy the movie and it was great.  Certain expectations didn't happen\, some did happen\, and I predicted a few new things that happened.  I hope the Star Wars saga can expand as this movie was great but it was limited to essentially an extended battleship scene.  Overall I loved this movie\, it's taking Star Wars and moving it forward from the previous 7 films (8) and I look forward to Ep 9\, spinoff films\, stand alone films\, and all else that comes with it.
